name: atls-tracker
description: ATLS Course Notifier is a web application built using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) that periodically checks for open registration spots on the [ATLS Course Website](http://www.atls.co.za/Course). When courses become available, the app notifies subscribed users via email and WhatsApp.
author: THAMISANQA <thamibonga@gmail.com>
